name: odyc
description: A tiny JavaScript library to create narrative games with pixels, sounds, and text.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:once
scripts.publish:next: npm version prerelease --preid=next && npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.publish:latest: npm version patch && npm publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm version patch  && git add . && git commit -m 'build: release' && git push --follow-tags

author: Charles Cailleteau
